import { TaskService } from './../shared/task.service'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {Task} from '../shared/task'; @Component({ selector: 'app-task-list', templateUrl: './task-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./task-list.component.css'] }) export class TaskListComponent implements OnInit { /* INJEÇÃO DE DEPENDENCIA Link: https://angular.io/guide/dependency-injection */ tasks: Task[] = []; constructor(private taskService: TaskService){ } ngOnInit() { this.tasks = this.taskService.getAll(); } }
